title: Smartphone user penetration in Argentina 2017 to 2023
summary: This statistic gives information on the user Argentina rate in Argentina from 2017 to 2023 .
In 2017 , 48 % of the Singaporean population were using the user .
In 2023 , this figure is projected to grow 61 % .
gold: The statistic shows the smartphone user penetration in Argentina as share of the population from 2017 to 2023.
In 2018 , 52 percent of the population in Argentina used a smartphone .
